about_the_game:
Choose a Character and obliterate your friends in this procedurally generated fast-paced top-down Arcade-style hero shoot 'em up. Start the game placed into a random room within the dungeon and choose to seek out other players or destroy objects in the environment to reveal game-changing Powerups to help overcome your foes. You have to move fast, however, because the map shrinks over time as rooms are locked off. Each room may be one of 7 different themes with different ways to interact with them with sometimes huge rewards!

Key Features
* Play with up to 10 players in a single game
* 10 unique Characters
* 7 unique room themes
* Highly customizable settings for your games. Speed up or slow down the pace of gameplay any way you wish
* 17 different Powerups
* Create private rooms for only your friends or public to play with anyone

name: Dungeonite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.7 ghz multi-core
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 30 fps in most cases
